title: Author's point of view and collapse of communism

content.question: The authorâ€™s point of view regarding the West was likely influenced by which of the following developments at the time he was writing?

choices.label: The collapse of communism in Eastern Europe and the end of the Cold War
The growing strength of environmental protest movements
The outbreaks of ethnic violence in Africa and Eastern Europe
The spread of the liberation theology movement in Catholic Latin American states

content.answer: The collapse of communism in Eastern Europe and the end of the Cold War

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
